svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Health burden due to communicable diseases vs. GDP per capita, 2012
The health burden of communicable diseases is measured by Disability Adjusted Life Years lost due to
GDP per capita (in US$; PPP adjusted)
DALYs lost (per 100,000) due to communicable diseases
Source: Penn World Table 9.0 (2016), Communicable Diseases – Disability Adjusted Life Years (per 100,000) - WHO (2015)
